1.content:
In a very green garden, in the center of the valley, lived a very fat, old, pale snail.

His name was Germaine.
** Image ID #196731 Unavailable **
1.title: Germaine

11.content:
Germaine was the largest snail in the garden, and also the oldest. He moved very slowly, as all snails do, but that was okay because Germaine was never in a hurry to get anywhere.

He just wanted to live in peace and eat green, leafy stuff.
11.title: Living in Peace

111.content:
And so he did. He ate branches. He ate leaves. He ate cabbage and lettuce and grass.

He ate green leafy stuff until he couldn't move anymore. And when he couldn't move anymore, he pulled himself into his shell and went to asleep. He was one fat and sassy snail.
111.title: Fat and Sassy

1111.content:
Being fat and sassy DID have its drawbacks. Germaine knew that. He knew being fat and sassy, also meant being slow and grumpy.
He didn't want to be slow and grumpy.
So...
** Image ID #196731 Unavailable **
1111.title: Slow & Grumpy

11111.content:
So Germaine decided to get out of his shell so to speak, and stretch some.

He poked his head out and stretched as far as he could. Then he would move back in forth in place. You see, he didn't have legs so he was working with limited power.
11111.title: Limited Power

111111.content:
He would roll his eyes and wiggle his antennaes. Then he would stretch his mouth wide and close it several times. He was already starting to feel better and he felt more limbered up.

He decided that it was time to go visiting his other friends.
111111.title: A Visiting We Will Go

choices: Germaine stops the trip and nibbles some cabbage
1111111.content: Germaine decided to visit Hermaine, the lovely snail across the garden.And since it takes ages for Germaine to go anywhere, he decided to make the trip early.He woke up at 5 a.m. the next morning.He stretched for a bit. Then he took off.He passed by some tasty cabbage.He stopped.
1111111.title: The trip

11111111.content:
Remembering his new wish not to be so fat and sassy, or slow and grumpy, he passed the cabbage up.

"I'm not going to eat that cabbage, " he said, "for it will make me fat and sassy, slow and grumpy."

He felt proud of his new willpower and continued on his way to see his friend Hermain. Maybe she would have something healthier to eat.
11111111.title: Will Power

111111111.content:
As he continued on his way, Germaine kept an eye out for a tasty, healthy snack. Nothing big. Just a little something to keep his energy up, he thought. For it was a long journey to the other side of the garden.

He passed by some radishes and decided to have a nibble. Just as he was about to have a bite, a rather large spider dropped down in front of him.

"Don't you know that radishes aren't very healthy?", the spider said.
111111111.title: The Spider

1111111111.content:
Even as wise and old as he was, Germaine believed the spider and so, went along on his way without so much as a second thought for the radishes.

He was still determined to get some excercise and eat healthier. He would just have to find something else to eat on the way to visit his friend, Hermaine.
1111111111.title: Determined

112.content:
Green, leafy stuff was pretty easy to find in the garden. Sometimes, Germaine could hardly see where he was going because there was so much of it around.
That's why he was so surprised one day when he woke up to find that everything had gone brown.
112.title: Where Did All the Green Go?

choices: Farmer plumb chases the snails with his hoe
Germaine reasons with the ornery codger
Germaine & Wally must move to another part of the garden
This looks like a job for... Captain Rutabaga!
12.content:
Germaine lived with his hetero-lifemate, Wally, inside a radish in Farmer Plumb's garden.

Farmer Plumb's radishes were famous for their delicious flavor and color, and people came from all around to watch them grow.

One day, a little girl was watching Germaine's radish, when she exclaimed, "Mama, there's a snail living inside that old radish!"

Farmer Plumb was very particular about his vegetable garden, especially his radishes. when he heard the little girl's complaints, he decided to investigate.

He waddled over to where the girl was pointing and said, "What in tarnation is going on here?"

Farmer Plumb got down on his hand and knees and peered at Germaine and Wally's shared radish, "Hmm.. Yep! There's critters in that there radish!"
12.title: Farmer Plumb

info.brief_description: To Germaine, a trip across the garden seemed like... forever.
info.description:
This is for all writers of ALL ages to create their own adventure around "Germaine the Wise Old Snail."

Please add small chapters, and be creative! Take this interactive story in any direction you choose to and please keep in mind, that in general, this story should be something children would like to read!
